ComicInfo.Characters: Kevin Matchstick,The Presbyter,Wally Ut,Emil Grackleflint,Magda,Kirby Hero,Joe Phat
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T17:35:34 [Issue ID 4000-105890] urn:comicvine:4000-105890 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev43 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-18 16:01:02. [Issue ID 105890]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Kevin and Magda take their relationship to the next level. Kevin is so involved with her that he doesn't notice the changes in Joe, who is now listless as a slave to the Leanhaun Sidhe. Wally, however, sees what's going on and banishes her from the apartment. Joe and Kevin meet the Presbyter and fight the Sprigginflints, who were about to kill a small faerie called a bogart. They catch one and get more information from him.
However when Joe gets home, the Leanhaun Sidhe catches him again and takes him to her lair in the Pale Incanter's faerie realm. Madga sees this and tells Kevin. They break in and see the succubus' old nest. Then Kirby shows up to help once again.
ComicInfo.Title: Foul Is Fair
ComicInfo.StoryArc: "Mage: The Hero Defined" The Hero Defined
